text: A polyp is a growth of tissue in areas such as the colon, stomach, nose and ear. It has a stalk which attaches the growth. If it does not have a stalk then it is called sessile. ==Other websites== * ASGE Website dedicated to colon cancer awareness and early detection. * ASGE Website educating the public about endoscopy. * National Institutes of Health polyp website Category:Medicine Category:Tissues
title: Polyp (medicine)
